studyMetadata.title: Faculty: Math problem difficulty survey
authors: Mahsan Nourani, Lace Padilla, Anjana Arunkumar, Shira Michel
studyMetadata.description: Determine the difficulty of 30 probability and combinatorics problems

uiConfig.studyEndMsg: **Thank you for completing the study. You may click this link and return to Prolific**: [https://app.prolific.com/submissions/complete?cc=CE0O11J3](https://app.prolific.com/submissions/complete?cc=CE0O11J3)
